detail_desc: All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and a jersey-lined hood with appliqués that continue down the back. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft inside.
One-shoulder top in slub jersey made from a cotton blend with one short sleeve and a straight-cut hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, deep side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, patterned slub jersey made from organic cotton with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, pockets in the side seams and a seam at the bottom with a flared skirt.

Straight-style, V-neck blouse in a gently crêped cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and small stand-up collar. Decorative drawstring with twisted cords and tassels, and long raglan sleeves with embroidery and elasticated cuffs.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with a decorative beaded appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jumper in a rib knit with a stand-up collar, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Dress in viscose twill with embroidery at the top and buttons down the back. Short sleeves with a scalloped frill trim, a gathered seam at the top and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Dress in striped cotton seersucker with a collar, buttons at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Non-wired push-up bra in lace and mesh with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, washed denim with embroidery and pompoms on the front, buttons at the back and patch pockets. Lined at the top.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes and a decorative strap at the front.
Playsuit in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, press-studs at the top, long sleeves with wide cuffs and short legs.
Long metal earrings with plastic pendants in various shapes. Length approx. 12 cm.
Sleeveless dress in cotton seersucker with elastication at the top and rope-look shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes, decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes, decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with fabric flowers. Lined.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Sleeveless dress in pleated, glittery tulle with wide satin shoulder straps and a wrapover bodice. Press-studs and a detachable satin bow at the back, a seam at the top and a double-layered tulle skirt for added volume. Lined.
Top in soft pile with a high stand-up collar and a zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, diagonal pockets at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with embroidery on the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with glass rhinestones. Diameter 3.5 cm, 4.5 cm and 5 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs, 4 pairs with faceted sparkly stones. Length from 0.4-6.6 cm.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Length 12 cm.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, gathered shoulder panels, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, gathered shoulder panels, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable braces.
